1580335642_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: What is the goal? You have to define the opportunities you seek to achieve and the risks you seek to avoid. Privacy is not the same thing as anonymity.

Porn is not good, yes, but at the same time, it is legal. What people fear is the illegal porn. Those who post should not be anonymous. Those who host should be anonymous.  When there is accountability for posts, illegal porn will reduce.
